partners.numerix: Numerix is a developer and helper. He published various addons and tutorials. Here are a few:

fork_me.title: How to contribute?
fork_me.description: The source code for this bot is available on our GitHub account. You can contribute freely to add new features to the mTxServ discord!
fork_me.explain: We would be very happy to receive help from developers who can help us fix bugs or add new features.

gs_status.invalid_format: :no_entry_sign: Invalid address, port is probably missing
